# Coding style

1. Every source file need to have a header comment, in .NET XML Documentation Format, with the following information:
   - File name
   - Author
   - Date created
   - Description of the file

2. Every method must be separated by the previous via a single blank line
3. No more than 1 blank line is allowed in a block of code, and it must never be the first of the last line of the block
